label: YRL216 / YRL236
description: Assure Lever Keypad with Z-Wave Plus

metadata.inclusion:
1. Enter the 4-8 digit Master PIN code followed by the gear key
2. Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
3. Press the 1 key followed by the gear key
metadata.exclusion:
1. Enter the 4-8 digit Master PIN code followed by the gear key
2. Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
3. Press the 3 key followed by the gear key
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the battery cover and batteries
2. Remove the interior escutcheon to access the reset button
3. While pressing the reset button for a minimum of 3 seconds, reinstall batteries
4. Release reset button
5. Replace battery cover
